name: BFF's Help
effect: Play this card during scoring. Add 3 points to any player's score this round.

name: Frenemy's Curse
effect: Play this card during scoring. Subtract 3 points from any player's score this round.

name: Joy of Puberty
effect: Play this card during scoring. Move your Dinosaur meeple backward on your escape route up to 5 spaces. For each space you move backward, add 1 point to any player's score this round.

name: Spiteful Bullying
effect: Play this card during scoring. Move your Dinosaur meeple backward on your escape route up to 5 spaces. For each space you move backward, subtract 1 point from any player's score this round.
